tool_description: This API allows you to retrieve profile, full list of followers, and following users from any public Twitter account.
name: Twitter Followers
title: Twitter Followers

api_list.name: Profile
api_list.description: Get basic information about a Twitter profile
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-followers.p.rapidapi.com/elonmusk/profile"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-followers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-followers.p.rapidapi.com/{username}/profile"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-followers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Following
api_list.description: This will return a list of following usernames for a given public Twitter username.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Page number of the following list.

api_list.name: Get Followers
api_list.description: This will return a list of follower usernames for a given public Twitter username.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Page number of the followers list.
